items.content_html: NanoService is an open-source framework that enables developers to build lightweight, modular, and scalable backend applications using nanoservices.
items.title: deskree-inc/nanoservice-ts: NanoService is an open-source framework that enables developers to build lightweight, modular, and scalable backend applications using nanoservices.

items.content_html: imgcompress is a lightweight, Dockerized image compression tool that converts HEIC from (iPhone Photos) and other photo formats to optimized JPEGs, resizes images for various use cases, and integrates seamlessly into CI/CD pipelines via a modern Web UI or CLI.
items.title: karimz1/imgcompress: imgcompress is a lightweight, Dockerized image compression tool that converts HEIC from (iPhone Photos) and other photo formats to optimized JPEGs, resizes images for various use cases, and integrates seamlessly into CI/CD pipelines via a modern Web UI or CLI.

items.content_html: jpd-express-error is a lightweight utility package designed to standardize error handling in Express microservices. It ensures consistent error responses, typed messages, and structured error propagation across your services.
items.title: babagha/jpd-express-error: jpd-express-error is a lightweight utility package designed to standardize error handling in Express microservices.   It ensures consistent error responses, typed messages, and structured error propagation across your services.

items.content_html: Parsewind is a lightweight utility that transforms Tailwind CSS classes into their corresponding inline CSS styles. It parses the provided Tailwind classes and converts them into a string of standard CSS styles.
items.title: marceloferreira357/parsewind: Parsewind is a lightweight utility that transforms Tailwind CSS classes into their corresponding inline CSS styles. It parses the provided Tailwind classes and converts them into a string of standard CSS styles.

items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.

items.content_html: A lightweight command-line backup tool with incremental snapshots, deduplication, and restore functionality. Efficiently tracks file changes and prevents redundant storage while maintaining full directory snapshots.
items.title: thewrightbrandon/back_it_up: A lightweight command-line backup tool with incremental snapshots, deduplication, and restore functionality. Efficiently tracks file changes and prevents redundant storage while maintaining full directory snapshots.

items.content_html: tansu is a lightweight, push-based framework-agnostic state management library. It borrows the ideas and APIs originally designed and implemented by Svelte stores and extends them with computed and batch.
items.title: AmadeusITGroup/tansu: tansu is a lightweight, push-based framework-agnostic state management library. It borrows the ideas and APIs originally designed and implemented by Svelte stores and extends them with computed and batch.
